alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 7:59PM CST until March 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County. For the Big Muddy River...including Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday evening to a crest of 22.0 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 800 AM CST.
